185965478.review: I've been playing ADOM for the past 20 years, and have battled fate and chaos through many versions. The rich and versatile experience has provided rewarding challenges, along side many cries of "Nooooooo!!!" as one of dozens of causes of death claims yet another character. I greatly appreciate the QOL improvements that have come over the years. Thanks to Thomas Biskup for developing this game which has held my attention for so long.

183623122.review:
Adom is a classic when a traditional roguelike is mentioned this and nethack likely are the first games to come to mind this game is fun even to this day even if some balancing is questionable in the name of "difficulty"
the biggest thing with this game is its obvious it was not finished (or more accurately finished then saw more development that was promptly abandoned) the graphics are extremely laggy and glitch galore and for every well thought out great mechanic this game has seems to have an equally terribly thought out bad mechanic the line between creative and arbitrary constantly being straddled
this extends to every portion of the game
probably half the classes are just blatantly worse versions of other classes (I don't care the healer can "heal more" it just a comparatively useless wizard) and some races the same (gray and high elves are the exact same other opinions are denial of obvious facts) and most skills often seeing use for just one or two niche reasons with others (like stealth of pickpockets) just outright useless creating a feeling that everything just was thrown at a wall ending with what sticks
While I enjoyed this game and genre in general ADOM is what i would describe a bipolar experience with getting the ultra ending *particularly so* and while i enjoyed the journey would not be my first pick in this genre nor do i see myself playing it again not helped with the everlasting note that this game is clearly abandoned to an extent a lot of sounds in the game are outright missing extending to even items required for certain end-games
if you are a die hard fan and somehow haven't played this though go ahead I suggest it
4/5 Elemental ChAoS orbs
also the OST is absolutely amazing
Praise Istaria
